transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Evasion
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Evasion
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Battlefield Commander
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Activates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> is currently increased.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Taunted by 30%

description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000037_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000037_1_1] turn(s)</color>. Activates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> is currently increased.

SKT_SECOND.name: Commander's Resolve
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from the caster at the start of the turn. Grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000037_2_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> from the caster at the start of the turn. Grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000037_2_2] turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Endurance Cannon
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and increases the <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000037_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase the Defense of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000037_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase the Defense of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000037_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000037_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
